mapper.select: select username, img_url, substring_index(group_concat(message order by created_at desc ),',', 1), max(created_at),is_delivery,uuid_from as friend_uuid, chatting_log.id as id from user,friend left join chatting_log on friend.uuid_second = chatting_log.uuid_from where friend.uuid_first = #{uuid} and friend.uuid_second=user.uuid and message is not null group by username order by created_at desc
select id, uuid_first, uuid_second from friend where uuid_first = #{uuid};
